snippet: As “stenographers” for postmatch news conferences, Linda Christensen and Julie C. Rabe have become parts of the men’s and women’s professional tennis tours, patches in the quilt, like umpires or ballboys.
abstract: Linda Christensen and Julie C Rabe are stenographers who transcribe all postmatch news conferences of the men's and women's professional tennis tours.
lead_paragraph: As “stenographers” for postmatch news conferences, Linda Christensen and Julie C. Rabe have become parts of the men’s and women’s professional tennis tours, patches in the quilt, like umpires or ballboys.

headline.seo: Press Conference Transcribers Have Unique Vantage of French Open
headline.main: To Keep Up With Tennis’s Best, It’s All in the Wrist
headline.print_headline: To Keep Up With Tennis’s Best, It’s All in the Wrist
